Package fi.fta.controllers

Class UsersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.fta.controllers.UsersController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/users")
public class UsersController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for user management operations, some are related to administrator actions, others might be used for particular user.
    Author:
    andrysta

      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/list/{role}",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.util.List<UserUI>> list​(@PathVariable("role")
                                                 UserRole role,
                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        List all user with a requested role. Available for ADMIN users only.
        Parameters:
        role - user role, like administrator or data provider
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of wrapped user objects

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="/add",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.lang.Long> add​(@RequestBody
                                        UserUI ui,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Add newly created user to the database. Available for ADMIN users only.
        Parameters:
        ui - newly created user
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        user ID in the database

      • addRight

        @RequestMapping(value="/add-right",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage addRight​(@RequestBody
                              UserRightUI ui,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Add right for user. Available for ADMIN users only.
        Parameters:
        ui - user right
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message

      • update

        @RequestMapping(value="/update",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage update​(@RequestBody
                            UserUI ui,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Update user from front-end (user input). Current user can update information about himself/herself, however cannot alter any rights. Only ADMIN users can update rights of current user or other users.
        Parameters:
        ui - user object from user input
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage delete​(@PathVariable("id")
                            java.lang.Long id,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Delete user from database. Available only for ADMIN users.
        Parameters:
        id - user ID in the database
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message

      • current

@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<UserUI> current​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,

      • changePassword

        @RequestMapping(value="/change-password",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage changePassword​(@RequestBody
                                    ChangePasswordUI ui,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Inputs and saves new password for the current user.
        Parameters:
        ui - object wrapper for changing password containing new and old passwords
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message

      • remind

        @RequestMapping(value="/remind",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleMessage remind​(@RequestBody
                            EmailUI ui,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Reminds password for email that is in database and belongs to a user.

        Not finished yet. It should send email with a link, where the user could enter new password for his/her account.

        Parameters:
        ui - email wrapper
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        success or error message
